events.title: Medication Prescribed
events.description: The patient was prescribed Atorvastatin 20mg tablets (56 tablets, take one daily), Lansoprazole 15mg gastro-resistant capsules (56 capsules, use once a day), and Metformin 500mg tablets (168 tablets, take three times a day).

events.title: Chronic Disease Management Required

events.title: Referral to Podiatry Service
